author: TextDriversKill
title: Trump on Hillary -"Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run" Belongs in jail
text: 744 Trump on Hillary -"Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run" Belongs in jail Why would hillary put government info on a private server unless she wanted it stolen by our enemies? China paid her millions to do that. Trump: Clinton shouldn't be allowed to run - CNNPolitics.com oct 10 2015 Washington (CNN)Donald Trump said Saturday that he doesn't know why Hillary Clinton is even in the race for the White House."Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run," Trump said to cheers at a large campaign rally in Norcross, Georgia. "If that were a Republican that did what she did with the emails they would have been in jail 12 months ago. Clink!" He added, "It's a very unfair system." The leading Republican candidate has repeatedly called the former Secretary of State's email situation in which she used a private server to send emails "a criminal problem." Reckless drivers are a bigger threat to you than all other criminals put together. Re: Trump on Hillary -"Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run" Belongs in jail "China paid her millions to do that" Source? As you are, I was. Join Date on an island off the left coast of Canada Last Seen Re: Trump on Hillary -"Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run" Belongs in jail Originally Posted by ToastyOats "China paid her millions to do that" Source? You probably don't want to see where that was pulled out of. You can't be first but you could be next. Re: Trump on Hillary -"Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run" Belongs in jail Originally Posted by ToastyOats "China paid her millions to do that" Source? Answer the question i asked. Why did hillary want to put classified info on a private server? THINK Reckless drivers are a bigger threat to you than all other criminals put together. 15,419 Re: Trump on Hillary -"Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run" Belongs in jail This thread has sunk the median IQ here at Debate Politics by a solid 10 points. It's GREAT to be me. --- "45% liberal/55% conservative" Diplomacy is the art of saying 'nice doggy" until you can find a gun. Re: Trump on Hillary -"Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run" Belongs in jail Originally Posted by TextDriversKill Why would hillary put government info on a private server unless she wanted it stolen by our enemies? China paid her millions to do that. Does he really think a Republican would already be in jail? I don't believe he really does. Re: Trump on Hillary -"Honestly, she shouldn't be allowed to run" Belongs in jail Originally Posted by TextDriversKill Answer the question i asked. Why did hillary want to put classified info on a private server? THINK Hillary never imagined that she would need to turn over anything that she did not want to. Why not ask the real question - how did anyone exchange classified information (with HRC) without realizing that it was not a secure site? We are talking about hundreds of folks with security clearances that are duty bound to report such things. The assertion that this was discovered by some congressional inquiry (years later?) is pure BS - lots of folks knew that this was happening and likely many of them were told to just shut up about it. This classified stuff did not originate from HRC's private site - but it was purposefully sent there. The reasonable man adapts himself to the world: the unreasonable one persists to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man. ― George Bernard Shaw, Man and Superman
